column4: Hi, I'm running Ubuntu on a laptop -- how do I remove all sounds? I have removed them from System -> Preference -> Sound but it still plays a little "drum solo" at the login screen
oh, thats part of the login screen ("GDM") theme. you'll have to edit the GDM theme to get rid of it I think.
actually, have a look in system > admin > login screen (or something like that)
there might be something in there about the login screen sounds
